+    return "\n".join(parts)
+    
+def get_nickname(favorability):
+    if favorability >= 60:
+        return "猫咪小姐"
+    elif favorability <= 40:
+        return "女士"
+    else:
+        return "被告小姐"

+    elif favorability <= 40:

 def get_past_story(favorability):
